content:
for event stream on beacon-apis, looking at https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/461 and https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/459
seems to me like the consensus raised on 461 was generally that we can not change event stream, and clients can just use the slot from json to determine the decoding, so im thinking i'll close eventstreamv2 tomorrow unless anyone has any objections to that approach...
